guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

meta_title: Why The Oligarchs Fear Christianity ‚Äì Gab News
title: Why The Oligarchs Fear Christianity ‚Äì Gab News

body:
They hate and fear Christianity because they are atheistic jews. They realize that God has abandoned them and they are no longer a part of his chosen people. According to the Revelation of John, God calls them pretend jews and the synagogue of satan, and when Jesus returns it is their army who will go out to fight him. 

Christians must choose, stand with Israel or stand with God. Be an anti-semite or an anti-christ.

Spoiler: They lose.

body: This is an utterly ridiculous spin of an argument. Jesus was anything but an anti-semite, he was Jewish himself and so were most of his early followers. What he hated was hypocritical sects of legalistic Jews (which quite frankly bear a close semblance to many american churches today). A pagan gentile doing the same thing was just as bad, it had nothing to do with their being jewish.
body_html: This is an utterly ridiculous spin of an argument. Jesus was anything but an anti-semite, he was Jewish himself and so were most of his early followers. What he hated was hypocritical sects of legalistic Jews (which quite frankly bear a close semblance to many american churches today). A pagan gentile doing the same thing was just as bad, it had nothing to do with their being jewish.

body: What good can there ever be in the world? Is it not evil by default? Do animals not still slaughter each other over pointless matters? Do twins not try to kill each other in the womb? Does every leader not become corrupt? Flesh and spirit oppose each other. Or have you forgotten that we are merely passing through this awful place? Do not be caught up in the affairs of this life, especially us-vs-them games, which breed judgementalism and self-righteous boasting.
body_html: What good can there ever be in the world? Is it not evil by default? Do animals not still slaughter each other over pointless matters? Do twins not try to kill each other in the womb? Does every leader not become corrupt? Flesh and spirit oppose each other. Or have you forgotten that we are merely passing through this awful place? Do not be caught up in the affairs of this life, especially us-vs-them games, which breed judgementalism and self-righteous boasting.

body: I'm not trolling. Jesus and his first disciples were thoroughly aramaic-speaking JEWS, not fair-haired europeans. That is a historical FACT and also documented in the gospels themselves, as Jesus's heritage was from the Davidic line. Does a black person killing a black person make the victim not black? People can kill other people of their own race. So trying to claim "well joos killed him so it must be because they're joos!" does not hold up, because in fact he himself is also Jewish.
